section.title: About
section.p: The Cellar Restaurant & 6-Pak Store is Blacksburg, Virginia's best restaurant featuring Italian, Mediterranean, & Greek food, a large beer list, and a craft beer store. Located in the heart of downtown Blacksburg, VA, the Cellar Restaurant is the perfect place for you to enjoy a relaxing night of great food, pick from a large beer list, and listen to music from local bands.

section.title: Menu
section.p: The Cellar offers fries as a Basket of Curly Fries for $4.75 or Loaded Curly Fries for $8.95. They also come as a side on their sandwiches.The Cellar MenuThe Cellar menu showing basket of curly and loaded fries.

section.title: Texture
section.p: These fries have a decent balance of a crispy exterior and a fluffy interior. They are the only curly option on this list, so if you prefer curly fries, you have to check these out.

section.title: Flavor
section.p: These fries have basic seasonings, simply salt and pepper.

section.title: Dipping Sauce
section.p: The Cellar offers basic dipping sauces: ketchup, mustard, and ranch.

section.title: Cost Value Analysis
section.p: $4.75 makes this the cheapest option in this guide!

section.title: Variability Rate
section.p: Keep in mind that I had have fewer visits to this restaurant so the variability rate may be as accurate as what this guide suggests.

section.title: Overall
section.p: The Cellar offers a mix of Greek and American cuisine and these fries fit perfectly. These fries on the side of a burger, sandwich, or gyro is a perfect, can't miss combo!The Cellar FriesPlate with burger, curly fries, and pickle.
